docs.snippet: Miami Marlins batting coach Tino Martinez resigned on Sunday afternoon amid claims he was abusive to several players, according to the Miami Herald and MLB.com....
docs.lead_paragraph: Miami Marlins batting coach Tino Martinez resigned on Sunday afternoon amid claims he was abusive to several players, according to the Miami Herald and MLB.com.

headline.main: Martinez Resigns as Marlins Coach After Alleged Player Abuse: Reports

docs.snippet: Japanese slugger Hideki Matsui was afforded an emotional farewell to Major League Baseball on Sunday, ending his glittering career as a New York Yankee after re-signing with his old team for less than two hours....

docs.snippet: As a long-term investment, gold has offered small overall returns with high volatility. But there is still an argument for keeping a sliver of it in a portfolio....
docs.lead_paragraph: As a long-term investment, gold has offered small overall returns with high volatility. But there is still an argument for keeping a sliver of it in a portfolio.
docs.abstract: N Gregory Mankiw Economic View column observes that as a long-term investment, gold has offered small overall returns with high volatility; contends, however, there is still an argument for keeping a sliver of it in a portfolio.

headline.main: Budging (Just a Little) on Investing in Gold
headline.print_headline: Budging (Just a Little) On Investing In Gold
